Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Hosiery \Ho"sier*y\, n. 1. The business of a hosier. [1913 Webster]
2. Stockings, in general; goods knit or woven like hose. [1913 Webster]
hosiery n : socks and stockings and tights collectively (the British include underwear as hosiery) [syn: {hose}]
